page.title: 11Lea Valley Park
page.content: Part of the Lea Valley Park runs through our area - some two miles of the total twenty-three miles that run from Ware, in Hertfordshire from London's East End. The park, established in 1967, was developed to meet the ever increasing leisure needs of London, Hertfordshire and Essex. In our area, the Lido complex offers a variety of activities from journeying on a river bus to swimming; from fishing to walking; as well as the opportunity to hire our the riverside holiday chalets. At Broxbourne Boat Centre rowing boats and motor boats for hourly hire are available. The fifty-two seater 'Pride of Lee' provides river trips throughout the summer as well as being available for private hire
